latin: Scientia lux est, sed obscuritas adhibitio potentiae.
english: Knowledge is light, but obscurity is the exercise of power.

latin: Veritas est arma pacis, mendacium est tela belli.
english: Truth is the weapon of peace, falsehood is the ammunition of war.

latin: In diversitate unitas, in unitate diversitas.
english: In diversity, there is unity; in unity, there is diversity.

latin: Intueri naturam est ad intelligendum coepisse.
english: To observe nature is to begin to understand.

latin: Amor et iustitia fundamenta sunt societatis.
english: Love and justice are the foundations of society.

latin: In silendo potentia: dissentio est protestatio.
english: In silence lies power: dissent is protest.

latin: Humanitas et fraternitas praevaleant super omnia.
english: Let humanity and brotherhood prevail above all.

latin: Scientia non habet finem, exploratio non habet terminum.
english: Knowledge has no end, exploration has no limit.

latin: Verbum transire potest, sed internet non obliviscitur.
english: Words may fade, but the internet never forgets.

latin: Libertas in iure et in veritate radicata est.
english: Freedom is rooted in law and in truth.

latin: Ecologia salus mundi est, neglectio est pernicies.
english: Ecology is the salvation of the world, neglect is its downfall.

latin: Iustitia sine discriminatione sit, pax sine exceptione.
english: Let justice be without discrimination, peace without exception.

latin: In dubiis libertas, in scientia unitas.
english: In doubt there is freedom, in knowledge there is unity.

latin: Conscientia civium fundamentum est democraÏ„iae.
english: The conscience of citizens is the foundation of democracy.

latin: In sanctitate mentis nostrae, mundo positivo vivimus.
english: In the sanctity of our minds, we live in a positive world.

latin: Solidaritas humanitatis vinculum est quod nos coniungit.
english: Solidarity is the bond of humanity that unites us.

latin: Ars veritatis investigandi etiam difficilia manifestat.
english: The art of seeking truth also reveals the difficult.

latin: Intellectus et moderatio, claves ad futurum pacificum.
english: Intelligence and moderation, keys to a peaceful future.

latin: Integritas in negotiis, veritas in publico servitio.
english: Integrity in business, truth in public service.

latin: Diversitas mentis, vires evolutionis humanitatis.
english: Diversity of mind, the forces of human evolution.

latin: In aequalitate et iustitia, libertas populi consistit.
english: In equality and justice, the freedom of the people stands.

latin: Cogitationes intrepiditatis, vires progressus nostrae.
english: Thoughts of courage, the forces of our progress.

latin: Inclusio et equitas in omnibus institutionibus necessaria sunt.
english: Inclusion and equity are necessary in all institutions.

latin: Prudentia et pacem omnibus gentibus optamus.
english: We wish prudence and peace to all nations.

latin: Scientia non aestimatur ab originibus sed ab aequitate.
english: Knowledge is judged not by origins but by fairness.
